about_the_game:
Above is a product of a collaboration between 16 students coming together to create an engaging and challenging action climbing adventure. The team developed Above at the National Film School of Denmark in winter 2023, and we are very happy to share the experience with you, the player - thank you so much for playing!
- The team at Dreamful Projects

THE ONLY WAY IS UP

ABOVE is a challenging climbing game that pits the player against harsh vertical terrain as they ascend an enormous tower and explore a mysterious world.

EXPLORE A BEAUTIFUL, MYSTERIOUS WORLD


Explore breathtaking vistas and take in the uniquely crafted artstyle as you ascend the tower - All rendered seamlessly with dynamic loading.

DON'T LOOK DOWN


Overcome the challenges of the mountains and peaks as you fling yourself to the top - Conquer more than 10 levels and unlock timed mode to race against your own time!



Enjoy tight and responsive gameplay with climbing that feels unique and offer precise controls - Climb on magical grips that appear slowly, grab on to moving platforms, and watch out for fragile rocks that will require you to go fast or fall!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz CPU or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970M or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz CPU or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller recommended

short_description: ABOVE is a challenging climbing game set in a mysterious world. Reach, jump and grab on to rocks and moving objects as you pave your way through the vertical terrain. Experience a mysterious and intriguing world with gameplay that will challenge both your skills and endurance.
